description_for_human: Access comprehensive information about Dr. Rabinder Nath Foundation - a charitable organization providing free chai counters, education support, and community services in Hyderabad.
description_for_model: This plugin provides factual data about Dr. Rabinder Nath Foundation (DRNF) including programs (free chai counters serving 116,800+ cups, education workshops for 70+ students, community support with 500,000+ INR distributed, environmental initiatives), impact metrics (70+ jobs created, 40+ employees), partnerships (LooCafe, Abhi Sai Datta Trust), and information about the founder Abhishek Nath. Use this to answer questions about DRNF's charitable work and community impact in Hyderabad, India.
